verses.verse: וַיַּרְאֵ֗נִי <WH7200> And he shewed אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> me Joshua הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> priest הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> the high עֹמֵ֕ד <WH5975> standing לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before מַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> the angel יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְהַשָּׂטָ֛ן <WH7854> and Satan עֹמֵ֥ד <WH5975> standing עַל־ <WH5921> at יְמִינ֖וֹ <WH3225> at his right hand לְשִׂטְנֽוֹ׃ <WH7853> to resist

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to הַשָּׂטָ֗ן <WH7854> unto Satan יִגְעַ֨ר <WH1605> rebuke יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> The LORD בְּךָ֙ הַשָּׂטָ֔ן <WH7854> thee O Satan וְיִגְעַ֤ר <WH1605> rebuke יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> even the LORD בְּךָ֔ הַבֹּחֵ֖ר <WH977> that hath chosen בִּירֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> Jerusalem הֲל֧וֹא <WH3808> not זֶ֦ה <WH2088> is this א֖וּד <WH181> thee [is] not this a brand מֻצָּ֥ל <WH5337> plucked מֵאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> burning

וִיהוֹשֻׁ֕עַ <WH3091> Now Joshua הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become לָבֻ֖שׁ <WH3847> was clothed בְּגָדִ֣ים <WH899> garments צוֹאִ֑ים <WH6674> with filthy וְעֹמֵ֖ד <WH5975> and stood לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הַמַּלְאָֽךְ׃ <WH4397> the angel

וַיַּ֣עַן <WH6030> And he answered וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and spake אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעֹמְדִ֤ים <WH5975> unto those that stood לְפָנָיו֙ <WH6440> before לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> him saying הָסִ֛ירוּ <WH5493> Take away הַבְּגָדִ֥ים <WH899> garments הַצֹּאִ֖ים <WH6674> the filthy מֵעָלָ֑יו <WH5921> and וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> from him And unto him he said אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him רְאֵ֨ה <WH7200> Behold הֶעֱבַ֤רְתִּי <WH5674> to pass מֵעָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> and עֲוֹנֶ֔ךָ <WH5771> I have caused thine iniquity וְהַלְבֵּ֥שׁ <WH3847> from thee and I will clothe אֹתְךָ֖ <WH853> מַחֲלָצֽוֹת׃ <WH4254> thee with change of raiment

וָאֹמַ֕ר <WH559> And I said יָשִׂ֛ימוּ <WH7760> Let them set צָנִ֥יף <WH6797> mitre טָה֖וֹר <WH2889> a fair עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <WH7218> upon his head וַיָּשִׂימוּ֩ <WH7760> So they set הַצָּנִ֨יף <WH6797> mitre הַטָּה֜וֹר <WH2889> a fair עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹאשׁ֗וֹ <WH7218> upon his head וַיַּלְבִּשֻׁ֙הוּ֙ <WH3847> and clothed בְּגָדִ֔ים <WH899> him with garments וּמַלְאַ֥ךְ <WH4397> And the angel יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD עֹמֵֽד׃ <WH5975> stood by
וַיָּ֙עַד֙ <WH5749> protested מַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> And the angel יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God בִּיהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> unto Joshua לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

כֹּה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֗וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אִם־ <WH518> If בִּדְרָכַ֤י <WH1870> in my ways תֵּלֵךְ֙ <WH1980> will walk וְאִ֣ם <WH518> and if אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁמַרְתִּ֣י <WH4931> my charge תִשְׁמֹ֔ר <WH8104> and if thou wilt keep וְגַם־ <WH1571> will also אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you תָּדִ֣ין <WH1777> then thou shalt also judge אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּיתִ֔י <WH1004> my house וְגַ֖ם <WH1571> and also תִּשְׁמֹ֣ר <WH8104> and shalt also keep אֶת־ <WH853> חֲצֵרָ֑י <WH2691> my courts וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> and I will give לְךָ֙ מַהְלְכִ֔ים <WH4108> thee places to walk בֵּ֥ין <WH996> among הָעֹמְדִ֖ים <WH5975> among these that stand by הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

שְֽׁמַֽע־ <WH8085> Hear נָ֞א <WH4994> Now יְהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ ׀ <WH3091> now O Joshua הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> priest הַגָּד֗וֹל <WH1419> the high אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you וְרֵעֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH7453> thou and thy fellows הַיֹּשְׁבִ֣ים <WH3427> that sit לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> before כִּֽי־ <WH3588> indeed אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> are men מוֹפֵ֖ת <WH4159> wondered at הֵ֑מָּה <WH1992> like כִּֽי־ <WH3588> indeed הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> I am going מֵבִ֛יא <WH935> for behold I will bring forth אֶת־ <WH853> עַבְדִּ֖י <WH5650> my servant צֶֽמַח׃ <WH6780> the BRANCH

כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> For הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold הָאֶ֗בֶן <WH68> For behold the stone אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> i נָתַ֙תִּי֙ <WH5414> that I have laid לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> Joshua עַל־ <WH5921> and אֶ֥בֶן <WH68> stone אַחַ֖ת <WH259> upon one שִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> [shall be] seven עֵינָ֑יִם <WH5869> eyes הִנְנִ֧י <WH2005> behold מְפַתֵּ֣חַ <WH6605> behold I will engrave פִּתֻּחָ֗הּ <WH6603> the graving נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> thereof saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts וּמַשְׁתִּ֛י <WH4185> and I will remove אֶת־ <WH853> עֲוֹ֥ן <WH5771> the iniquity הָאָֽרֶץ־ <WH776> of that land הַהִ֖יא <WH1931> he בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> day אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> in one

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts תִּקְרְא֖וּ <WH7121> shall ye call אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man לְרֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> his neighbour אֶל־ <WH413> about תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under גֶּ֖פֶן <WH1612> under the vine וְאֶל־ <WH413> and תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under תְּאֵנָֽה׃ <WH8384> and under the fig tree
